solution_line_template: First find the total number of cans Jack can fit on one shelf: {cans_per_row} cans/row * {rows_per_shelf} rows/shelf = {cans_per_shelf} cans/shelf

Then find the number of cans he can fit on all the shelves in one closet: {cans_per_shelf} cans/shelf * {shelves_per_closet} shelves = <<{cans_per_shelf}*{shelves_per_closet}={cans_per_closet}>>{cans_per_closet} cans
